Package index

All functions

BAMS_config
The MEMC model configuration for BAMS
COMISSION_config
The MEMC model configuration for COMISSION
CORPSE_config
The MEMC model configuration for CORPSE
MEMS_config
The MEMC model configuration for MEMS
MEND_config
The MEMC model configuration for MEND
MIMCS_config
The MEMC model configuration for MIMCS
configurations
Configurations
dynamics
MEMC supported SOM flux dynamics
fluxes
Flexible SOM fluxes
memc_all_configs
List of all the pre-defined MEMC models
memc_colorPalette()
Return a color palette for the the default MEMC model configurations and other simulations
memc_configure()
Set up a model configuration
memc_incubation_andisol
Example data, time series and initial conditions for Andisol from Wang et al. 2013 (10.1890/12-0681.1)
memc_incubation_gelisol
Example data, time series and initial conditions for Gelisol from Wang et al. 2013 (10.1890/12-0681.1)
memc_incubation_mollisol
Example data, time series and initial conditions for Mollisol from Wang et al. 2013 (10.1890/12-0681.1)
memc_incubation_ultisol
Soil incubation respiration fluxes from Wang et al. 2013
memc_initial_state
The default initial carbon pool values used by the default MEMC model configurations
memc_modfit()
Fit a MEMC model to a comparison data
memc_params
The parameter values for the basic MEMC model configurations from Wang et al. 2013
memc_sensfun()
Local sensitivity for a MEMC model
memc_sensrange()
Global sensitivity ranges for a MEMC model
memc_solve()
Solve a MEMC configuration
memc_update_config()
Update a model configuration
memc_update_params()
Update the parameter table with new values
update_state()
Update the state vector values; this is for internal function use
